translated: Of the thirty-five Sugatas,

original: thub pa'i dbang po'i spyod pa ci 'dra bar //
analyzed: thub pa'i dbang po'i spyod pa ci 'dra bar //
translated: May my conduct be like that of the Lord of Sages.

original: bdag gi spyod kyang de dang 'dra bar shog / bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma ti tsi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: bdag gi spyod kyang de dang 'dra bar shog / bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma ti tsi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise of the thirty-five Sugatas called Adorned with Precious Names composed by Master Mati-Citta is completed.
